column1: .@realDonaldTrump was right to call out Pelosi & Newsom. In 2011-12, 157M spent on homeless services 2015-16 $242M 2019-20 >$364M Obviously their efforts failed! Washing streets & scooping human waste has not done enough. Now, THEIR NEGLIGENCE could promote spreading #COVID19

#COVID19 spreads mainly through respiratory droplets along w/ contact of infected patients; however, new research suggests that it can also spread through feces. When fecal matter dries, particles become airborne & can spread dangerous viruses which can be fatal if inhaled.
